trans-unit.source: Encapsulates the methods and search patterns used to execute a query against the underlying principal store.
trans-unit.target: Encapsula os métodos e os padrões de pesquisa usadas para executar uma consulta em relação ao armazenamento de entidade subjacente.

trans-unit.source: The default page size of 256 KB is used when the PrincipalSearcher class performs a query for domain principals.
trans-unit.target: O tamanho de página padrão de 256 KB é usado quando a classe PrincipalSearcher executa uma consulta para entidades de segurança de domínio.

trans-unit.source: The application may override the default value by setting the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher.PageSize%2A> property in the underlying <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher> object that is returned from the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher.GetUnderlyingSearcher%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: O aplicativo pode substituir o valor padrão, definindo o <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher.PageSize%2A>propriedade subjacente <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher>objeto que é retornado o <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher.GetUnderlyingSearcher%2A>método.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher.GetUnderlyingSearcher%2A> </xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher> </xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher.PageSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher.QueryFilter*> property must be set before the Principal searcher object can be used to perform a search.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher.QueryFilter*>propriedade deve ser definida antes do Principal objeto pesquisador pode ser usado para realizar uma pesquisa.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher.QueryFilter*>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher"></xref> class with the specified query filter.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher"> </xref> classe com o filtro de consulta especificada.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.Principal"></xref> object that specifies the filter to use for the search.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.Principal"> </xref> objeto que especifica o filtro a ser usado para a pesquisa.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher.QueryFilter*> property is initialized to this value.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher.QueryFilter*>propriedade é inicializada para esse valor.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher.QueryFilter*>

trans-unit.source: Persisted principal objects can not be used as the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher.QueryFilter*>.
trans-unit.target: Objetos principais persistentes não podem ser usados como <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher.QueryFilter*>.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher.QueryFilter*>

trans-unit.source: The queryFilter parameter cannot be null or empty.
trans-unit.target: O queryFilter parâmetro não pode ser nulo ou vazio.

trans-unit.source: Gets that principal context that is used to perform the query.
trans-unit.target: Obtém esse contexto principal que é usado para executar a consulta.

trans-unit.source: The context specifies the server or domain against which search operations are performed.
trans-unit.target: O contexto Especifica o servidor ou domínio no qual as operações de pesquisa são executadas.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalContext> object contained in this property is obtained from the context property of the principal object set in the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher.QueryFilter%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalContext>objeto contido nesta propriedade é obtido da propriedade de contexto do objeto principal definidas <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher.QueryFilter%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher.QueryFilter%2A> </xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalContext>

trans-unit.source: Queries are performed using the credentials specified in the principal context object and the container specified in the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement%2CPrincipalContext.Container%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Consultas são executadas usando as credenciais especificadas no objeto de contexto principal e o contêiner especificado no <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement%2CPrincipalContext.Container%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement%2CPrincipalContext.Container%2A>

trans-unit.source: For <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.ContextType> and <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.ContextType> context types, the container is the Distinguished Name (DN) of a container object.
trans-unit.target: Para <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.ContextType>e <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.ContextType>tipos de contexto, o contêiner é o nome diferenciado (DN) de um objeto de contêiner.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.ContextType> </xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.ContextType>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalContext"></xref> object that specifies the server or domain against which operations are performed.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalContext"> </xref> objeto que especifica o servidor ou domínio no qual as operações são executadas.

trans-unit.source: Disposes the current instance of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Descarta a instância atual do <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: Returns a principal search result that contains a collection of all the principal objects that match the principal specified in the query filter property.
trans-unit.target: Retorna um resultado de pesquisa principal que contém uma coleção de todos os objetos principais que correspondem a entidade especificada na propriedade de filtro de consulta.

trans-unit.source: The principal objects returned in the principal search result match the type of object contained in the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher.QueryFilter%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Os objetos principais retornados na correspondência de resultados de pesquisa principal o tipo de objeto contido no <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher.QueryFilter%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher.QueryFilter%2A>

trans-unit.source: The search is conducted in the context specified in the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher.Context%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: A pesquisa é realizada no contexto especificado no <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher.Context%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher.Context%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the Query by Example overview topic.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte a consulta por tópico de visão geral do exemplo.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearchResult%271> object that matches the query filter or an empty collection if no results are found.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearchResult%271> objeto que coincide com o filtro de consulta ou uma coleção vazia se nenhum resultado for encontrado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher.QueryFilter*> contains referential properties. For more information, see the Query by Example overview topic. The <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher.QueryFilter*> is a persisted principal.
trans-unit.target: O <> </> *> contém propriedades referenciais. Para obter mais informações, consulte a consulta por tópico de visão geral do exemplo. O <> </> *> é uma entidade de segurança persistente.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher.QueryFilter*> must first be assigned to the principal searcher before the query can be performed.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher.QueryFilter*>deve ser atribuído primeiro para o Pesquisador de objeto para a consulta possa ser executada.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher.QueryFilter*>

trans-unit.source: Returns a principal search result that contains the first principal object found that matches the principal specified in the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher.QueryFilter*> property.
trans-unit.target: Retorna um resultado de pesquisa principal que contém o primeiro objeto encontrado que corresponda a entidade especificada no <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher.QueryFilter*>propriedade.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher.QueryFilter*>

trans-unit.source: If there is exactly one match of the object specified in the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher.QueryFilter%2A>, this method returns that object.
trans-unit.target: Se houver uma correspondência exata do objeto especificado no <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher.QueryFilter%2A>, esse método retorna o objeto.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher.QueryFilter%2A>

trans-unit.source: If there are multiple matches of the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher.QueryFilter%2A> object, this method arbitrarily returns one of the matching principals.
trans-unit.target: Se houver várias correspondências do <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher.QueryFilter%2A>do objeto, este método retorna um dos objetos de correspondência arbitrariamente.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher.QueryFilter%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.Principal> object returned from this method matches the type of object contained in the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher.QueryFilter%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.Principal>objeto retornado desse método corresponde ao tipo de objeto contido no <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher.QueryFilter%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher.QueryFilter%2A> </xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.Principal>

trans-unit.source: The search is conducted in the context specified in the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher.Context%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: A pesquisa é realizada no contexto especificado no <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher.Context%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher.Context%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the [Query by Example](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/84ac40bb-04c4-4d0b-adaf-0ddb9253599e) overview topic.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte o [consulta pelo exemplo](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/84ac40bb-04c4-4d0b-adaf-0ddb9253599e) tópico de visão geral.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.Principal"></xref> object that contains the principal object that matches the query filter or null if no results are found.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.Principal"> </xref> objeto que contém o objeto principal que coincide com o filtro de consulta ou nulo se nenhum resultado for encontrado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher.QueryFilter*> contains referential properties. For more information, see the [Query by Example](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/84ac40bb-04c4-4d0b-adaf-0ddb9253599e) overview topic. The <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher.QueryFilter*> is a persisted principal.
trans-unit.target: O <> </> *> contém propriedades referenciais. Para obter mais informações, consulte o [consulta pelo exemplo](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/84ac40bb-04c4-4d0b-adaf-0ddb9253599e) tópico de visão geral. O <> </> *> é uma entidade de segurança persistente.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher.QueryFilter*> must first be assigned to the principal searcher before the query can be performed.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher.QueryFilter*>deve ser atribuído primeiro para o Pesquisador de objeto para a consulta possa ser executada.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher.QueryFilter*>

trans-unit.source: Returns the underlying search object that is used by the Account Management API to perform the search.
trans-unit.target: Retorna o objeto subjacente de pesquisa que é usado pela API de gerenciamento de conta para executar a pesquisa.

trans-unit.source: The application can modify the properties directly on the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher> object before executing the query.
trans-unit.target: O aplicativo pode modificar as propriedades diretamente no <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher>objeto antes de executar a consulta.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher>

trans-unit.source: The query will then execute using the modified properties.
trans-unit.target: A consulta será executada em seguida, usando as propriedades modificadas.

trans-unit.source: For example, the default page size of 256 KB is used when the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher> class performs a query for <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.ContextType.Domain> principals.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, o tamanho de página padrão de 256 KB é usado quando o <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher>classe executa uma consulta para <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.ContextType.Domain>entidades.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.ContextType.Domain> </xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher>

trans-unit.source: The application may override the default value by setting the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher.PageSize%2A> property in the underlying <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher> object that is returned from this method.
trans-unit.target: O aplicativo pode substituir o valor padrão, definindo o <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher.PageSize%2A>propriedade subjacente <xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher>objeto que é retornado deste método.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher> </xref:System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher.PageSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.DirectorySearcher"></xref> object.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher.QueryFilter*> must first be assigned to the principal searcher before the query can be performed. The <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher.QueryFilter*> contains referential properties.
trans-unit.target: Um <> </> *> deve ser atribuído primeiro para o Pesquisador de objeto para a consulta possa ser executada. O <> </> *> contém propriedades referenciais.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the [Query by Example](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/84ac40bb-04c4-4d0b-adaf-0ddb9253599e) overview topic.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte o [consulta pelo exemplo](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/84ac40bb-04c4-4d0b-adaf-0ddb9253599e) tópico de visão geral.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher.QueryFilter*> is a persisted principal.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher.QueryFilter*>é uma entidade de segurança persistente.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher.QueryFilter*>

trans-unit.source: Returns the type of the object returned from the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher.GetUnderlyingSearcher*> method.
trans-unit.target: Retorna o tipo do objeto retornado do <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher.GetUnderlyingSearcher*>método.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher.GetUnderlyingSearcher*>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Type> that specifies the type of object returned from the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher.GetUnderlyingSearcher*> method.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Type>que especifica o tipo de objeto retornado do <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher.GetUnderlyingSearcher*>método.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher.GetUnderlyingSearcher*> </xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher.QueryFilter*> must first be assigned to the principal searcher before the query can be performed.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher.QueryFilter*>deve ser atribuído primeiro para o Pesquisador de objeto para a consulta possa ser executada.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.PrincipalSearcher.QueryFilter*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the query filter that is used to locate matching principals.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o filtro de consulta que é usado para localizar objetos correspondentes.

trans-unit.source: The principal object contained in this property can be any type of object derived from the principal class; computer, user, or group.
trans-unit.target: O objeto principal contido nessa propriedade pode ser qualquer tipo de objeto derivado da classe principal; computador, usuário ou grupo.

trans-unit.source: The QueryFilter can also be an extended principal type that is defined by extending either <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.Principal>, <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.UserPrincipal>, <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.GroupPrincipal> or <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.ComputerPrincipal>.
trans-unit.target: O QueryFilter também pode ser um tipo de entidade estendido definido, estendendo o <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.Principal> <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.UserPrincipal>, <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.GroupPrincipal>ou <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.ComputerPrincipal>.</xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.ComputerPrincipal> </xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.GroupPrincipal> </xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.UserPrincipal> </xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.Principal>

trans-unit.source: The type of the derived class object that is passed to this property determines the type of object that is queried.
trans-unit.target: O tipo do objeto de classe derivada que é passado para essa propriedade determina o tipo de objeto que é consultado.

trans-unit.source: The resulting query contains a logical AND of all the properties set on the specified principal object.
trans-unit.target: A consulta resultante contém um AND lógico de todas as propriedades definidas no objeto principal especificado.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the Query by Example overview topic.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte a consulta por tópico de visão geral do exemplo.

trans-unit.source: For more information on the extended classes, see the [Principal Extensions](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/49d1b257-d652-4224-bdae-2edabced8f00) overview topic.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre as classes estendidas, consulte o [Principal extensões](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/49d1b257-d652-4224-bdae-2edabced8f00) tópico de visão geral.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.Principal"></xref> object that is used for the query or null if no filter is set.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.Principal"> </xref> objeto que é usado para a consulta ou null se nenhum filtro é definido.

trans-unit.source: Persisted Principal objects can not be used as the QueryFilter.
trans-unit.target: Os objetos Principal persistentes não podem ser usados como o QueryFilter.

trans-unit.source: The QueryFilter cannot be null or empty.
trans-unit.target: O QueryFilter não pode ser nulo ou vazio.
